TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LogicalMethodInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示的属性和元数据 XML Web 服务方法。

span.span: Represents the attributes and metadata for an XML Web service method.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要由使用 SOAP 扩展以询问与 SOAP 扩展配置为运行 XML Web 服务方法的详细信息。 is used primarily by a SOAP extension to interrogate the details of the XML Web service method with which the SOAP extension is configured to run. 具体取决于 SOAP 扩展的配置方式，它可以找出有关中的 XML Web 服务方法的详细信息方法采用。Depending on how the SOAP extension is configured, it can find out details about the XML Web service method in the method of that takes a . 访问提供的详细信息，例如 XML Web 服务方法的参数属性和任何自定义特性应用于 XML Web 服务方法使用属性。The provides details such as the XML Web service method's parameters by accessing the property and any custom attributes applied to the XML Web service method using the property. 有关 SOAP 扩展的详细信息，请参阅类或[消息使用 SOAP 扩展修改 SOAP](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/esw638yk(v=vs.100))。For more details on SOAP extensions see the class or [SOAP Message Modification Using SOAP Extensions](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/esw638yk(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AsyncCallbackParameter As ParameterInfo
public: property System::Reflection::ParameterInfo ^ AsyncCallbackParameter { System::Reflection::ParameterInfo ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取参数信息异步调用中 Begin 方法的参数。

span.span: Gets the parameter information for the parameter of a Begin method in an asynchronous invocation.

value.span: 一个表示参数的异步方法调用。

span.span: A representing the parameter of a asynchronous method invocation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时中的异步设计模式涉及调用`Begin`方法来启动异步方法调用和`End`方法来完成调用。The asynchronous design pattern in the common language runtime involves calling a `Begin` method to start the asynchronous method invocation and an `End` method to complete the invocation. `Begin`方法采用两个其他参数，除了同步版本的方法所定义的参数： 一个用于存储委托和一个用于存储需要传递给委托的任何状态信息。The `Begin` method takes two additional parameters besides the parameters defined by the synchronous version of the method: one to store a delegate and one to store any state information that needs to be passed on to the delegate. 此属性表示的参数使用参数名的委托`AsyncCallback`。This property represents the parameter for the delegate with a parameter name of `AsyncCallback`. 以异步方式调用 XML Web services 的详细信息，请参阅[与 XML Web Services 进行异步通信](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/tz4bkcx2(v=vs.100))。For more information on invoking XML Web services asynchronously, see [Communicating with XML Web Services Asynchronously](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/tz4bkcx2(v=vs.100)). ## Examples [!code-cpp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CPP/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CS/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/VB/logicalmethodinfo_create2.vb#1)]

related.span: 与 XML Web services 进行异步通信

span.span: Communicating with XML Web Services Asynchronously

public: property System::Reflection::ParameterInfo ^ AsyncResultParameter { System::Reflection::ParameterInfo ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取的返回值异步方法调用。

span.span: Gets the return value of a asynchronous method invocation.

value.span: 一个表示从返回异步方法调用。

span.span: A representing the returned from a asynchronous method invocation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时中的异步设计模式涉及调用`Begin`方法来启动异步方法调用和`End`方法来完成调用。The asynchronous design pattern in the common language runtime involves calling a `Begin` method to start the asynchronous method invocation and an `End` method to complete the invocation. `Begin`方法通常将立即返回一个对象，实现与接口，然后传递给`End`在更高版本的时间来完成异步方法调用的方法。The `Begin` method typically returns immediately with an object implementing the interface, which can then be passed to the `End` method at a later time to complete the asynchronous method invocation. 返回的对象实现接口表示此属性。The returned object implementing the interface is represented by this property. 以异步方式调用 XML Web services 的详细信息，请参阅[与 XML Web Services 进行异步通信](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/tz4bkcx2(v=vs.100))。For more information on invoking XML Web services asynchronously, see [Communicating with XML Web Services Asynchronously](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/tz4bkcx2(v=vs.100)). ## Examples [!code-cpp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CPP/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CS/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/VB/logicalmethodinfo_create2.vb#1)]

related.span: 与 XML Web services 进行异步通信

span.span: Communicating with XML Web Services Asynchronously

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时中的异步设计模式涉及调用`Begin`方法来启动异步方法调用和`End`方法来完成调用。The asynchronous design pattern in the common language runtime involves calling a `Begin` method to start the asynchronous method invocation and an `End` method to complete the invocation. `Begin`方法采用两个其他参数，除了同步版本的方法所定义的参数： 一个用于存储委托和一个用于存储需要传递给委托的任何状态信息。The `Begin` method takes two additional parameters besides the parameters defined by the synchronous version of the method: one to store a delegate and one to store any state information that needs to be passed on to the delegate. 此属性表示需要传递到委托的状态信息。This property represents the state information that needs to be passed into the delegate. 以异步方式调用 XML Web services 的详细信息，请参阅[与 XML Web Services 进行异步通信](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/tz4bkcx2(v=vs.100))。For more information on invoking XML Web services asynchronously, see [Communicating with XML Web Services Asynchronously](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/tz4bkcx2(v=vs.100)). ## Examples [!code-cpp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CPP/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CS/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/VB/logicalmethodinfo_create2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性检索到的引用声明此成员的类型。The property retrieves a reference to a for the type that declares this member. 类 （或接口） 的成员声明或继承自基类 （或接口）。A member of a class (or interface) is either declared or inherited from a base class (or interface). 返回可能不能为相同实现 XML Web 服务的类 (如果此类派生自的基类，并且该基类中声明此类表示的方法则返回是基本类）。The returned might not be the same as the of the class implementing the XML Web service (if that class derives from a base class and the method represented by this class is declared in that base class then the returned is the base class). ## Examples [!code-cpp[LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor/CPP/logicalmethodinfo_constructor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor/CS/logicalmethodinfo_constructor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor/VB/logicalmethodinfo_constructor.vb#1)]
